name: Maggie's Clams Casino
author: Al Peacock
summary: These are delicious Clams Casino that my girlfriend makes for me, with a few of my own refinements. Great for the game on Sunday.
ingredients: ¼ cup Italian-style dry bread crumbs
4 slices bacon, cut into 1 inch pieces
directions: Place each clam onto a clean 1/2 shell; set aside
In a food processor or blender, combine green and red pepper, red onion, bread crumbs, garlic, sea salt, pepper, oregano and butter
Blend until mixture becomes a mush, but not watery
Spoon 1 teaspoon of mixture onto the top of each clam, and add one 1 inch piece of bacon on top
Place the clams on a broiler pan and place under broiler about 4 inches from the heat
Broil for 8 to 12 minutes or until desired crispness of bacon is achieved
